dict.acceptation: [口语、方言]诉诸法律，对…起诉，控告；

sent.orig: LAW-Tried to collect the bounty on Zapan Illudis, but was killed by Denim at Fort Kadoriga.
sent.trans: LAW－在凯德利加堡试图强取扎潘·琉达斯身上的赏金，与经过此处的德尼姆发生了战斗，其间被杀。

sent.orig: LAW-Sorceror assigned to guard Amorika Castle. Was killed by Denim and his battalion.
sent.trans: LAW－防守阿尔摩利卡城门的巫士，瓦尔斯塔解放军内部分裂后他仍然选择效忠公爵，在抵御德尼姆和莱欧纳尔的攻势时阵亡。

sent.orig: Wang Chuan-shans law making, law executing law changing, are law abiding law idea.
sent.trans: 王船山的立法、执法、变法、守法等法律思想是王船山法律思想的几个核心议题。

sent.orig: Air law is a complex legal branch complicated with law and law, international law and law.
sent.trans: 航空法是一个复杂的法律部门，既包括公法又包括私法，既包括国际法又包括国内法。

sent.orig: The EU law, neither traditional law nor national law, has the character of the supranational law.
sent.trans: 欧盟法具有“超国家法”的特点，不是传统意义上的国际法，也不是国家法。
